>
[Concealed Holster](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1202)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather holster is crafted to better hide small firearms from view. Only firearms designed for use in one hand are small enough to disguise with this holster. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks and DCs to hide or conceal a firearm or hand crossbow in this holster.

</column>
